goal.ch:
過去20年，人工智慧已經成功用於解決日常生活中的問題。本課程將介紹正在改變世界的AI技術，課程包含幾個部分:
(1) 以搜尋來解決問題(e.g., Google map 怎麼算出最短路徑); 
(2) 決策 (e.g., 機器人怎麼做決定); 
(3) 深度學習 (e.g., CNN, GAN, Transformer, LLM, ChatGPT)
(4) 深度強化學習 (e.g., DQN)
(5) 大語言模型與機器人 
學生將受到密集的動手實作訓練與AI演算法解決問題的訓練。
課程最後，每位同學都必須分組做期末計畫，本課程的主要目標是你必須
”訓練你的機器人學會一件事情”。

注意事項:
1. 在期中競賽與期末計畫中，學生可分組，兩人一組。
2. 本課程的作業、期中競賽、期末計畫都需要寫程式。
3. 本課程使用“數學機器人實驗室“的機器人。
http://w2.math.ncu.edu.tw/about/aimakerlab
4. 本課程需要的基礎(a)線性代數; (b)機率; (c)程式 (C or python)
goal.en:
In the past 20 years, the AI community has successfully applied to solve real world problems. This course is to introduce the cutting-edge AI technology. It includes:  
(1) Problem solving by search (e.g., Google map finds the shortest); 
(2) Decision-making (e.g., how robots make decisions); 
(3) Deep learning (e.g., CNN, GAN, Transformer, LLM, ChatGPT)
(4) Deep reinforcement learning (e.g., DQN)
(5) LLM and Robotics
Students will receive intensive hand-on training and AI algorithms for problem-solving. During the last part of this course, each student should work on the final project.
The goal of this course is to train your robot to learning how to work on something.

outline.ch:
During this course the following topics will be covered:
Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
Problem Solving by Search
- BFS, DFS and A*
- Adversarial Search (games)
Decision-making
- MDP and POMDP
Deep learning
- FCN, CNN
- GAN
- Transformer ＆ LLM ＆ ChatGPT
- Adversarial attack
Reinforcement Learning
- Q-learning
- Deep reinforcement learning
- LLM ＆ robotics

gradMethod.ch:
The grade for this course will consist of the following components:
Homework (X3) 30％
Midterm competition30％
Project Proposal (1-2 page) 10％
Project Presentation and Demonstration 10％
Project Report (4-8 pages) 20％

In the final project, the students need to propose an interesting AI application, formulate the problem, and implement algorithms on a real robot (e.g., Minibot or Bebop) or simulator (e.g, ROS).“
